articles.content: LONDON (Reuters) - Britains financial regulators on Friday called a formal halt to nearly all Libor rates from the end of this year, as expected, piling pressure on markets to speed the switch in int… [+1962 chars]

articles.title: Dija: London startup launches 10-minute grocery delivery with £14.4M seed funding - UKTN (UK Technology News
articles.description: Dija is the newest company on the block that aims to revolutionise the already overpopulated UK grocery shopping market & it is now live in London.
articles.content: The online grocery industry is gaining momentum during the ongoing pandemic and as more and more consumers are habitual of shopping this way. According to research from Capgemini, 56% of UK consumers… [+5691 chars]
